reviews.review: fasza
Me gusta mucho la historia de este Juego! su motor grafico es muy bueno y de pocos requisitos!!!

<•>Half Life 2 este continuarea primului joc cu acelaşi nume, creat de VALVE. Fiind First-Person Shooter aduce, ca şi  în trecut, o serie de avantaje ce pot îmbunătăţi experienţa de joc. Grafica este una relativ mai bună decât cea în precedentul Half Life. Acţiunea se petrece la 20 de ani de la incidentul Black Mesa, în care, în urma unei cascade de rezonanţă, au apărut extratereştri de diferite rase, care au ucis aproape toţi oamenii de ştiinţă şi securitatea din facilitatea de cercetare Black Mesa. Actiunea se întinde pe mai multe planuri si spații, oferind o experiență cu adevărat mirobolantă pe parcurusul jocului.
            <•>Părere personală: Este un joc care merită jucat, ce-ți poate pune mintea la încercare în diferite momente oportune; vine și cu o grafică destul de bună(am ținut să precizez din nou), pentru un joc de acest tip. Un avantaj este și designul UX, fiind asemănător cu cel din toate jocurile FPS create de VALVE.
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
<>Sunt mult mai multe de spus, dar mai bine îl încerci ca să te convingi singur.]<>
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

Game tries too hard to show off its brand spanking new physics engine. The story is ok and the combat is ok, but honestly... this game is just a bore with all of its forced puzzles and "WHOA CHECK OUT WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH THIS!".
10/10 ведьмак от мира фпс

I have so many happy memories of playing this game in school. Quickly hiding it from teachers. Me and my friend had a race to see who would finish the campaign first. I have only recently re-visited the game and found that the game still amazes me. The storyline and connection to characters is so amazing. I feel deep sadness whenever one of my rebel comrades fall to the combine, it is this connection that brings the game to life. Definently worth having in your steam libary. 

10/10

Half life 2 is alltime favorite game and its the best game I have ever played , this game may not have had a impact like half life 1 but it's a damn good sequel. The game contains a rich world that is controlled by the combine alien race(ayy lmao) with great detail that really shows this world has gone to hell , beautifuly voice acted and written characters that really help the story , a good amount of weaponary that is balanced , and with all of these elements and many more holds one of the greatest FPS and best games of alltime. If you have not bought this masterpiece of a game do yourself a favor and gabe newel and the whole half life team and buy not just this game but the Half life complete bundle. Also the episodes are worth playing.
It's still a good story to play!

There WILL be a Half-Life 3.  Maybe just not in our lifetime.  Yes, I have taken transhumanism into consideration, a well as many other factors, so stop trying to second guess me on this and be a grown ass man. (Note:even if you are female, if you grock the Freeman, you're a grown ass man as far as HL is concerned.)  Should I say anything more about Half-Life 2 at this juncture?  I could very well waste valuable seconds describing its splendor and glory, but my basest common sense tells me that our world is already fully complented to that end.  Should you play this game?  That's for you to decide.  If I were you I would already own it and have a semi-in anticipation of the sequel.  But that's if I were you, which I am not. OR AM I???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????(i'm not)

But if I were, yeah you guessed it.  See how smart you are?  The only thing keeping you from being smarter is your infantile reluctance to play Half Life 2.  And if you're over that hump, then you're a better man than I.  Was.  Before I played Half Life 2.   TELL YO MAMA!!!

Me atreveria a decir que esta es la joya de la corona en cuanto a videojuegos (a excepcion de nintendo claro esta) nunca en mi vida un personaje de un juego me avia hecho sentir aprecio o me avia metido tanto en el personaje como en este sin duda, Gordon Freeman es un gran heroe con historia y trasfondo y el mismo juego te hace querer protejer a alyx en todo momento y eso es un gran punto a favor que hace  que la saga de Half-Life sea una de las mas increibles y claro por desgracia esta historia no tiene un desenlace de momento.
